reviewText: I thought there was a mound of information that could be taken and used practically in every ones daily life.  We all need a nudge to do and eat right.  Most American's do no eat the right foods or at the proper times of the day.  This guide will teach you all the habits that we need to incorporate in our daily lives.  I would recommend this video to just about anyone that wanted to improve their life.

Best diet book that I've ever read. It's very thorough and lays out a step by step plan on how to take back your health. I've lost 64 lbs using his plan and studying and implementing his habits of health.
the program works -- you should listen to Dr W. Anderson....
Excellent material for reference as a health coach.

I wish it was more current; seemed a little dated. I also felt it was too scripted and the 'actresses' came across unnaturally. Content was good and make sure to have the workbook so you can follow along!

Yea! Dr. A,!!!!  This guy really cares about the state of the Worlds health and is determined to do something about it one person at a time. What a Legacy!!  Get this; get signed up with Take Shape for Life and get your health back!!  Truly a gift!!
Very simple and easy to understand.
